feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking npm export script to project components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text mapping of frontend file paths to their descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/package-exports.mjs: Node script that builds the site and creates ZIP archives for static build and full source.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing marketing sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with brand info, quick links, Instagram link, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky header with logo, navigation, and Instagram follow button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section describing Zayaâ€™s mission and values.
Contact section with Instagram card and location, phone placeholder, and email info.
Section displaying three featured collection cards and Instagram link.
Renders the homepage hero with background image, brand title, tagline, and Instagram/collections buttons.
Displays a grid of feature cards explaining key brand benefits using icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, and utility classes for the site's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for styling the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, known issues, and architectural notes for the build/export workflow.
